input_email_body:
Subject: Unexpected Stall in Digital Campaigns Due to Configuration Issues

Dear Customer Support, We are experiencing unexpected stalling in our digital campaigns, and we suspect a configuration mismatch might be the root cause. We have attempted to restart our systems and review the logs, but the issue remains unresolved You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. We have also reached out to our vendors, but no solution has been found yet. Could you please investigate this matter and provide guidance or support to resolve it? Thank you for your time and assistance. Sincerely, [Your Name] My name is Sophia Rossi.
